# Vigenere Cipher Cracker

This Python script is designed to crack Vigenere ciphers. It employs a statistical analysis method to determine the key length and then uses a Caesar cipher cracking technique to reveal the original plaintext.

## Usage

1. **Clone the Repository:**
   ```bash
   git clone https://github.com/LunguIon/Vigenere.git
   cd Vigenere


##Install Dependencies:
pip install -r requirements.txt
##Run the Script:
python3 crack.py

##Enter Vigenere Cipher Text:
You will be prompted to enter your Vigenere cipher text. Paste or type the text and press Enter.

##View Results:
The script will analyze the text, determine the key length, crack the Vigenere cipher, and display the decrypted text along with the encryption key.

##Sample Text for Testing
